title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon and pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta according to package instructions.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.
